text: Lawless Alan (born February 2, 2000) is an American stock car racing driver. He competes full-time in the ARCA Menards Series West and part-time in the ARCA Menards Series, driving the No. 12 Toyota Camry for Bill McAnally Racing in both series. Alan has also competed in the NASCAR Whelen All-American Series for his family team, Dasher Lawless Racing. ==Racing career== After joining Bill McAnally Racing part-time in 2019, Alan returned to the team for a full season in the 2020 ARCA Menards Series West. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
